title: What constraints matter here?
detail: Constraints aren't limitationsâ€”they're creative fuel. Telling Claude the format, length, tone, audience, or what to avoid focuses the response dramatically. The more specific your boundaries, the less Claude has to guess.
surface_triggers: User asks for creative or open-ended output. User hasn't specified format, length, tone, or audience. Request could reasonably go in many different directions. User is asking for writing, code, or other generative content.
satisfaction_triggers: User specifies format, length, tone, style, or audience. User defines what to include or exclude. User sets boundaries on the response. Phrases: keep it, no more than, in the style of, for [audience], avoid, don't include, format as, make it [adjective], should be [constraint].
